description: Single storey detached garden outbuilding to be used as gym/store (following demolition of outbuilding); installation of PV Panels
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be retained in accordance with drawing / document title number(s): P-001 OS Map; P-002 Proposed Block Plan; P-003 Existing Ground floor plan; P-004 Existing Elevations; P-005 Proposed Ground and Roof Plan; P-006 Rev B Proposed Elevations; P-010 Rev B Photographs
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2024).

| The detached outbuilding hereby approved shall be used only for domestic purposes incidental to the dwelling on this site, and shall not be used for separate habitable accommodation, letting or any commercial use. No cooking or kitchen facilities shall be installed at any time.

Reason: To ensure that the development does not detract from the amenity of the adjoining properties, and to enable the Local Planning Authority to retain control over the use of the building in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Development Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3, D4 and D6 of the London Plan (2021), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2024).

| The solar PV or solar thermal equipment shall not result in the highest part of the solar PV or solar thermal equipment being more than 0.6 metres higher than the highest part of the roof (excluding any chimney).

Reason: To ensure that the equipment would not become a dominant feature within the street scene or harm local character, in accordance with Policies 7B and LV7.4 of the Ealing Development Management DPD and Policies D1 and D4 of the Ealing Development Management DPD
